bill.summary:
Bankruptcy Administration Improvement Act of 2017
This bill increases the amount of compensation paid to trustees in chapter 7 (liquidation) bankrtupcy proceedings. Similarly, it increases the statutory filing fee for bankruptcy petitions under chapter 7.
